definition:
A distribution ensemble $\{D_n\}_{n\in\mathbb{N}}$ is *pseudorandom* if
it is computationally indistinguishable from the ensemble
$\{U_n\}_{n\in\mathbb{N}}$ where each $U_n$ is the uniform distribution
on the support of $D_n$. That is, no reasonable procedure can make
meaningful predictions about what element will be chosen.
